title: Getting Bug Splatted
body: I have followed all of the tips on how to fix bug splat errors but I still can't load into games. I go through picks and bans fine but when i try to load in I get a bug splat error.  I noticed more people than usual is having this problem so I don't know if this is a patch specific issue or not. Nothing I seem to do can fix that any advice could help on how to fix it would help. Thanks.

replies.body:
It sounds like everytime you try loading into a game, the client pulls on a certain file that might be corrupted and then crashes. Since you've been through the steps in our [**Bug Splat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974), there might be a very specific issue going on. 

Reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to dig deeper to figure out whats happening!
